entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add an overload of `CSharpSyntaxTree.Create` that allows to specify checksum algorithm #62923
  • The Compile ItemGroup intellisense cache is not refreshed when a build finishes #62922
  • Ref field declarations should require runtime feature #62919
    17.4
  • Expose HostWorkspaceServices off of Solution, instead of just off of Workspace. #62914
  • `AccessibilityModifiersRequired` default might not be respected correctly #62908
  • Provide a mechanism to inspect and modify a project's package references from a code fixer #62904
  • VS 17.3 Preview 3 Regression from Preview 2 with ref-returning from a struct #62901
  • VS 17.3 Preview 3 Regression from Preview 2 with ref-returning an out parameter #62900
  • [API proposal]: Unseal `DiagnosticDescriptor` #62899

Closed

  • Typo in API name: `ShouldShowItemsFromUnimportNamspaces` #62177
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not access Workspace through HostWorkspaceServices #62926
    Area-IDE
  • Remove enterprise level code for 'false' #62925
    Area-IDE
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
  • Single-thread crossgen InteractiveHost64 for determinism build #62918
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move more features over to Solution.Services from Workspace.Services (2) #62915
    Area-IDE
  • Move more features over to Solution.Services from Workspace.Services (1) #62912
    Area-IDE
  • Go through Solution (not Workspace) to get services #62911
    Area-IDE
  • Do not go back to Workspace in SyntaxEditor #62910
    Area-IDE
  • Fix deconstruction test #62907
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Minor code cleanup for options #62906
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Assert option have editorconfig location #62905
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Issue delete and insert edits when changing parameter types #62897
    Area-Interactive

Merged

  • Revert "Fix PR Validation pipeline" #62870
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • HasChangesAsync should return false if the document content did not changed #62849
    Area-Interactive
  • Expose WorkspaceKind off of Solution snapshot instance #62913
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Skip 3 flaky integration tests #62917
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Block constant and relational pattern matching on types inheriting from or constrained to INumberBase<T> #62653
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove SolutionServices in favor of HostWorkspaceServices #62909
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Renamed `ShouldShowItemsFromUnimportNamspaces` to `ShouldShowItemsFromUnimportedNamespaces` #62898
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62920
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix async rename prefs string #62867
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62902
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move AnalyzerOptionsProvider to Analyzers layer #62859
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62928
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62927
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Enable updated escape rules if System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeFeature.ByRefFields exists #62304
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add correctness check that only runs analyzers #62035
    Area-IDE
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unnecessary tracking of unmatched parameters in method invocation escape analysis #62847
    Area-Compilers
  • Trivial refactorings around generator document identity #62878
    Area-IDE
  • Remove support for 'ref scoped' #62788
    Area-Compilers
  • `ref` parameters to `ref struct` types should be `scoped ref` by default #62778
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • First steps of the hovering feature and simple test case #62569
    Community
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support target-typing switch expression result type to tuples #62896
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Derive unnecessary imports analyzer from AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62895
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • Update method invocation escape analysis to match spec changes #62886
    Area-Compilers
